= Alphabetical list of demo codes =
RImageBook package contains 48 image processing demos that are used in the [http://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/4320019784/ book]. After [RImageBookInstallationEn installing RImageBook package], you can run a demo simply by typing demo(name of a demo) in the R console.
